https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/6CairS7YOuyLDdo1LxqdoEGZApf.jpg Unable to purchase a $50,000 digital projector, a group of film fanatics in rural Pennsylvania fight to keep a dying drive-in theater alive by screening only vintage 35mm film prints and working entirely for free. At the Drive-In
